DESCRIPTION: Burning creatures lose HP at the start of their turn.
When receiving attack damage, deals damage back. NL Lasts one turn.
Flame cards apply #yBurning. NL They apply more when you have #yFervor.
Smash cards are powerful attacks that exhaust.
Endurance cards are powerful Blocking cards that exhaust.
Swipes are #b0 cost attack cards that hit ALL enemies and cannot be removed.
For each stack of Spirit Rend creatures receive 25% more damage from #yBurning.
Vigor adds damage to your next attack.
Vitality adds #yBlock to your next blocking card.
When Robust, drawing a Status card exhausts it and draws a new card.
When Blessed, drawing a Curse card exhausts it and draws a new card.
Creatures inflicted with Anti-magic take damage when applying buffs or debuffs(including debuffs blocked by artifact).
Vitality adds #yBlock to your next blocking card.
Metallicize adds block at the end of your turn.
Start each combat with this card at the bottom of your draw pile.
A power is Active if you are currently under its effects.
